attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Council Service Tax on all EEC Migrant  Workers.
This could be £5.00 a week stopped from wages by The inland revenue and returned to the local councils to help with there overstreached finances caused by these type of immigrants

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
